positions.name: position1
positions.title: The Past
positions.meaning: The past events that bear on this current question. The currents that have led you to the present situation.

positions.name: position2
positions.title: The Present
positions.meaning: Your current attitude, struggles, and/or hopes regarding the current question. Your current course.

positions.name: position3
positions.title: The Future
positions.meaning: The most likely outcome should you continue on the current course. Where you will end up.
